info.title: OpenALPR CarCheck API
info.description:
The OpenALPR CarCheck API allows you to send images to the cloud for processing. 
The image will be analyzed for license plates and vehicle make/models.  The results 
are returned in JSON format

get.description: Get a list of available results for plate and vehicle recognition

post.description:
Send an image for OpenALPR to analyze and provide metadata back
The image is sent as a file using a form data POST

parameters.name: secret_key
parameters.description:
The secret key used to authenticate your account.  You can view your 
secret key by visiting 
https://cloud.openalpr.com/

parameters.name: recognize_vehicle
parameters.description:
If set to 1, the vehicle will also be recognized in the image
This requires an additional credit per request

parameters.name: country
parameters.description:
Defines the training data used by OpenALPR.  "us" analyzes 
North-American style plates.  "eu" analyzes European-style plates.

This field is required if using the "plate" task

parameters.name: return_image
parameters.description:
If set to 1, the image you uploaded will be encoded in base64 and 
sent back along with the response

parameters.name: topn
parameters.description:
The number of results you would like to be returned for plate 
candidates and vehicle classifications

parameters.name: is_cropped
parameters.description:
When providing a plate or vehicle that is already cropped,  
this performs a recognition against the full crop and does not 
attempt to localize the plate/vehicle

image.description: The image file that you wish to analyze

X-Ratelimit-Reset.description: Epoch time when the next period begins

X-Ratelimit-Remaining.description: Number of remaining requests allowed during this period

X-RateLimit-Limit.description: Maximum number of requests allowed from your IP in a period

401.description: User not authorized or invalid secret_key

post.description:
Send an image for OpenALPR to analyze and provide metadata back
The image is sent as base64 encoded bytes.

parameters.name: secret_key
parameters.description:
The secret key used to authenticate your account.  You can view your 
secret key by visiting

parameters.name: recognize_vehicle
parameters.description:

This field is required if using the "plate" task

If set to 1, the image you uploaded will be encoded in base64 and

parameters.name: topn

candidates and vehicle classifications

requestBody.description: The image file that you wish to analyze encoded in base64

X-Ratelimit-Reset.description: Epoch time when the next period begins

X-Ratelimit-Remaining.description: Number of remaining requests allowed during this period

X-RateLimit-Limit.description: Maximum number of requests allowed from your IP in a period

401.description: User not authorized or invalid secret_key

post.description:
Send an image for OpenALPR to analyze and provide metadata back
The image is sent as a URL.  The OpenALPR service will download the image 
and process it

parameters.name: image_url
parameters.description: A URL to an image that you wish to analyze

parameters.name: secret_key
parameters.description:
The secret key used to authenticate your account.  You can view your 
secret key by visiting 
https://cloud.openalpr.com/

parameters.name: recognize_vehicle
parameters.description:
If set to 1, the vehicle will also be recognized in the image
This requires an additional credit per request

parameters.name: country
parameters.description:
Defines the training data used by OpenALPR.  "us" analyzes 
North-American style plates.  "eu" analyzes European-style plates.

This field is required if using the "plate" task

parameters.name: return_image
parameters.description:
If set to 1, the image you uploaded will be encoded in base64 and 
sent back along with the response

parameters.name: topn
parameters.description:
The number of results you would like to be returned for plate 
candidates and vehicle classifications

X-Ratelimit-Reset.description: Epoch time when the next period begins

X-Ratelimit-Remaining.description: Number of remaining requests allowed during this period

X-RateLimit-Limit.description: Maximum number of requests allowed from your IP in a period

401.description: User not authorized or invalid secret_key

confidence.description: Confidence percentage that the plate number is correct

matches_template.description: Indicates whether the plate matched a regional text pattern

candidates.description: All the top N candidates that could be the correct plate number

confidence.description: Confidence percentage that the plate number is correct

coordinates.description:
The X/Y coordinates of the license plate in the image
Four coordinates are provided that form a polygon starting
from the top-left and moving clockwise ending in the bottom left

matches_template.description: Indicates whether the plate matched a regional text pattern

plate.description: Best plate number for this plate

processing_time_ms.description: Number of milliseconds to process the license plate

region.description: Specified or detected region (e.g., tx for Texas)

region_confidence.description: Confidence percentage that the plate region is correct

requested_topn.description: The max number of results requested

X-Ratelimit-Reset.description: Epoch time when the next period begins

X-Ratelimit-Remaining.description: Number of remaining requests allowed during this period

X-RateLimit-Limit.description: Maximum number of requests allowed from your IP in a period

api_401.description: User not authorized or invalid secret_key
